reviews.review_msg: I am not that into literature to begin with so I never really like any English classes. That being said, I did find Prof Fleming to be a pretty good lecturer. I was bored a lot.The term paper was graded tough but the exam was ok. If you have questions, you need to ask your ta as the prof does not help.
Awful class, the professor did not help at all.He expected too much for a first year class.

I would not recommend taking this class! Professor Fleming talks about large and complex ideas but makes his analysis very broad and vague to the point where it is not helpful at all. This is a first year English course and its as if he expects students to already be amazing literary analysts. He preaches that his students should be confident in

JD is a great prof! I really enjoy his lecture style (however, he doesn't post slides or anything it's just writing what he says mostly). He makes the literature engaging and his criteria are clear and concise. I would highly recommend taking a class with him!
